long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Autotask UI fixes and improvements:

* Improves MFA one-time-code autofill support for password managers like 1Password
* When previewing invoices, moves the PREVIEW watermark to the background so invoice text can be selected
* Makes links in ticket checklists clickable

Icon made by Pixel perfect (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/pixel-perfect) from https://www.flaticon.com/.
